TopicTitle: How do you find out part count?

Articles.Content:
Stupid question I guess. I have Mechjeb and Engineering Redux, both for 0.23 and I could have sworn they used to show the part count but I can't see it now. Am I missing something?

Many thanks.

Under vessel information (I think).

Definitely* shows you in the VAB.

* When I used these mods in 0.19
Using Mechjeb? Not any more. It just shows Max acceleration, Current acceleration, Max thrust, Vessel mass, Surface TWR and Crew capacity under Vessel info and that's in the VAB.
Click on load in the VAB or SPH and you'll see all the ships with their partcounts.
OMG thank you. I feel so dumb now.

Using Mechjeb? Not any more.

You can edit the window and add the Part Count info item.
If you have it on the launch pad or run way you can go into map mode and hit the information tab. This will update as you drop stages and give you the current weight of the vehicle.
